name: Astro (itch) (L4J0)
description: 5minutes Questsolvergame Astro is a shortstory questgame. It takes place in a small cave on the planet Veriscin. Astro, the main character is a well known explorer.  His last journey left his rocket damaged. So get it repaired. Four NPCs are waiting for you with quests to get done. What are you waiting for? Keyboard Controls W A S D/ Arrow Keys to move E to interact Q to open the questlog Leftclick on mouse to navigate through dialogue ESC to get to the pausemenu for PS Controller Left thumbstick to move Right thumbstick to move the camera Quadrangle to interact Triangle to open the Questlog Cross to confirm UI-Elements when allready selected Optionsbutton to get to the pausemenu
